name: Gloptic
description: Gazing into the chromatic depths of Gloptic's eye will hypnotize suggestible Monsters in a harp-beat! Once under the mucky Monster's spell, their target begins to experience a wide range of delightful visions known as Gloptical Illoozions. While harmless, Gloptical Illoozions are infamous for causing chronic brain-itch.
